R

readSockect() - Method in class model.sockets.Client
This method waits for the server and if there is one server it read the information and update the information.
readSockect() - Method in class model.sockets.Server
This method waits for an client and if there is one client it read the information with an auxliar method.
readSocketAux() - Method in class model.sockets.Server
This method reads the information that is passed through the socket.
recibeMessage(UpdateInfo) - Method in class controller.GameController
This method is a thread, it verifies if the old info still the same or if the opponent send different information.
recibeMessageAux() - Method in class controller.GameController
this is an auxiliary method of recibeMessage(oldInfo) which interprets the new information and habilitates the interface again.
recibeNewInfo() - Method in class model.game.Game
This method reads the information from the socket.
reciberLife - Variable in class model.history.HistoryNode
This int contains the points of life the person who receive the card has.
reciberName - Variable in class model.history.HistoryNode
This string contains the name of the person who receive the card.
revertSenalDeck(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.GameController
When the mouse is not among the deck this method eliminates the animation that shows how many cards will be discounted also the one that rotates the cardD0 which propose is decoration.
round - Variable in class model.game.Game
This is the number of the round.

This number contains the number of the round.
round - Variable in class model.sockets.UpdateInfo
The round in the game.
